name: Strawberry Plant
details: A sweet, red fruit plant that is perfect for home gardens.
growTips: Plant in well-drained soil with plenty of sunlight. Water regularly, but avoid overwatering to prevent root rot.

name: Lemon Tree
details: A citrus tree that produces fragrant flowers and juicy lemons.
growTips: Place in a sunny spot and water deeply once a week. Fertilize every 4-6 weeks during the growing season.

name: Rose Plant
details: A beautiful flowering plant that comes in various colors.
growTips: Roses thrive in well-drained soil with 6-8 hours of sunlight. Prune regularly to encourage new growth and blooming.

name: Tomato Plant
details: A versatile fruit plant that produces juicy tomatoes.
growTips: Plant in full sun and water consistently. Use stakes or cages to support growth.

name: Lavender
details: An aromatic garden plant known for its soothing fragrance.
growTips: Lavender prefers well-drained soil and full sun. Water sparingly and prune in spring to shape.

name: Blueberry Bush
details: A fruit-bearing shrub that produces sweet, nutritious blueberries.
growTips: Plant in acidic, well-drained soil with full sun. Water regularly and mulch to maintain moisture.

name: Sunflower
details: A tall garden plant with bright yellow flowers that follow the sun.
growTips: Sunflowers need full sun and well-drained soil. Water deeply and regularly, especially during dry spells.

name: Orchid
details: A delicate flowering plant that is prized for its beautiful, exotic flowers.
growTips: Orchids thrive in indirect light and high humidity. Water sparingly and use orchid-specific fertilizer.

name: Basil
details: A fragrant herb used in cooking, especially in Italian cuisine.
growTips: Basil needs full sun and well-drained soil. Pinch off the flowers to encourage leaf growth.

name: Peach Tree
details: A fruit tree that produces sweet and juicy peaches.
growTips: Plant in full sun with well-drained soil. Prune in late winter and thin fruit to improve size and quality.

name: Tulip
details: A popular spring-blooming flower with vibrant colors.
growTips: Tulips need full sun and well-drained soil. Plant bulbs in the fall for spring blooms.

name: Mint
details: A refreshing herb used in teas, desserts, and cooking.
growTips: Mint grows best in partial shade with moist, well-drained soil. It's best to plant in containers as it can spread quickly.
